amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Missile Defense Agency by $966.2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 110-666 to reduce funding for the Missile Defense Agency by $966.2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 292 (Roll no. 357).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
